General.Name: DG Innovate PLC
General.Description: DG Innovate Plc engages in the research and development of electric mobility and energy storage technology solutions. Its electric drive technology platform comprises Pareta, that consists of a motor, high power inverter, and control electronics; and energy storage technology includes a family of hard carbon anode materials for use in sodium-ion batteries, as well as applications in existing lithium-ion batteries production. The company was formerly known as DG Innovate Ltd and changed its name to Deregallera Holdings Ltd in April 2022. DG Innovate Plc was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Caerphilly, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Unit 2 De Clare Court, Caerphilly, United Kingdom, CF83 3HU
